items.title: Chartist Talk: Bet on these 2 stocks with worst over for HUL, Maruti Suzuki looks overbought after 18% rally, says Centrum’s Nilesh Jain
items.description: Overall, the technical setup appears weak, but with the monthly August expiry approaching, any positive trigger could spark a strong short-covering rally in the Nifty 50, said Centrum’s Nilesh Jain.

items.title: Asian shares post modest drop with focus on Nvidia
items.description: Chips and the electronics sector were in focus with Nikon Corp. shares jumping 20% in Japan while Chinese artificial intelligence linchpin Cambricon Technologies Corp. swung to a record profit.

items.title: Stock market holiday today: BSE, NSE to remain shut for Ganesh Chaturthi
items.description: Trading on the NSE and the BSE will resume on August 28 (Thursday).

items.title: Vedant Fashions announces final dividend of ₹8, ex-date due tomorrow
items.description: Vedant Fashions' stock ended at ₹758.05 on Tuesday, declining by 2.70% compared to the previous day's close.

items.title: Maruti Suzuki AGM due tomorrow; stock trades up 1.81%
items.description: Maruti Suzuki's scheduled AGM is the standard annual meeting. Financial performance over the past year shows steady growth in key areas.

items.title: OIL and BPCL join hands to create a gas distribution network in Arunachal Pradesh
items.description: The agreement also serves a strategic purpose as it aligns with the government's push toward a gas-based economy and clean energy access in the North-eastern region.

items.title: Rakesh Gangwal family set to offload 3.1 percent stake in IndiGo via block deals worth Rs 7,020 crore
items.description: The floor price of the block is pegged at Rs 5,808 per share, which will be a 4% discount to last traded price, and the block is likely to be executed on August 28.
